resources.string: Takes user to the Settings Page
Takes user to SMS, Phone call and email page
Your current ambient temperature in celsius (°C) is:
No temperature sensor available on device.
Your device\'s X, Y and Z axis acceleration is:

This is a collection of small and fun utility programs designed to provide you with semi-useful information about your device.
 
 Ambient Weather: This program displays the current ambient air temperature. Not all devices have an ambient temperature sensor.
 
 Device Location: This program shows your device's current location in coordinates latitude and longitude, which can be useful for scavenger hunts or geocaching.
 
 Accelerometer: This program measures your device's acceleration on its X, Y and Z axis measured in m/s^2 and displays it in real time.
 
 Proximity: This program uses the device's sensors to measure the distance between the device and an object. The measurement is displayed in centimeters.
 
 Do I vibrate: Try me! Check whether your device will vibrate or not.
 
 Internet Connection: This program checks whether your device is currently connected to the internet, which can be helpful for troubleshooting connectivity issues.
 
 We hope you find these programs useful and fun, and that it helped you pass some time when you're bored!
This device\'s proximity to the nearest object is:

This is a simple calculator that can perform basic arithmetic operations, as well as find if the given result is a prime number or not.
 
 Calculator: Performs basic arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The calculator can also convert your number to percentage, as well as converting it into negative.
 
 Prime Checker: You can check whether the result of your calculation is a prime number or not. This feature can be helpful for those who work with numbers and need to quickly determine if a number is prime or not.
 
 Save: You can save the result of your calculation, along with the prime checker status, by hitting the "Save" button. This way, you can retrieve your last result and prime checker status when you open the app again.
 
 We hope you find this calculator and prime checker useful, and helps you polish your multiplication table or prime number knowledge to impress your friends!

We understand that sometimes we all need a break or simply a way to pass some time while waiting
- that's where our app comes in handy.
 
 With our three exciting pages, you can spend your time taking quizzes, crunching numbers with our calculator, check if a number is prime or explore different features of your device with our utility page.

Our app is designed to offer you a fun and entertaining way to pass the time, no matter where you are.\n \n Ready to go? Let\'s get started! Simply press one of the buttons below and see where it takes you!
We want you to waste time
